title: Jamie Dimon says AI is already reshaping JPMorgan Chase's workforce as bank plans 'huge redeploymentâ€™
summary_full: JPMorgan, the world's biggest bank by market cap, has the industry's largest annual tech budget at nearly $20 billion, and it has outlined an ambitious AI plan.
summary_public: JPMorgan, the world's biggest bank by market cap, has the industry's largest annual tech budget at nearly $20 billion, and it has outlined an ambitious AI plan.
